info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.operate.dhcp
info.description:
Proto definitions for DHCP lease display. All leases provided to
clients will be displayed.

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace

x-example: "value"
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

parameters.name: site
parameters.description:
Site Name

x-example: "value"
Name of the site

dhcpDhcpKeyValuePair.description: DHCP Option information as a (key, value) pair.
dhcpDhcpKeyValuePair.title: DHCP Option information

dhcpDhcpLeaseInfo.description: Information about DHCP lease given by VER DHCP server.
dhcpDhcpLeaseInfo.title: DHCP Lease Information

client_id.description:
Client identifier of the client

Example: ` "ff:73:6f:68:76:00:30:00:15:25:40:0b:aa:d7:0f"`
client_id.title: Client Identifier

interface.description: Name of the ver interface to which the client is connected
interface.title: Interface

ip.description:
IP address leased to the client

Example: ` "192.168.10.55"`
ip.title: IP

mac.description:
Mac address of the client

Example: ` "02:03:04:05:06:07"`
mac.title: Mac

dhcpDhcpLeases.description: Active list of DHCP leases that have been leased by VER DHCP server.
dhcpDhcpLeases.title: DHCP Leases

address_count.description: Number of addresses in the subnet that DHCP can lease
address_count.title: Address Count

free_address_count.description: Number of addresses in the subnet that are free (not allocated)
free_address_count.title: Free Addresses

interface.description: Name of the ver interface to which the subnet is assigned
interface.title: Interface
